snippet: Two men say photographs and an article that made them look as if they were suspected in the Boston Marathon bombings inflicted emotional distress.
abstract: Salaheddin Barhoum and Yassine Zaimi file suit against The New York Post, accusing paper of invading their privacy and inflicting emotional distress by publishing article that made them look as if they were suspected in Boston Marathon bombings case.
lead_paragraph: Two men say photographs and an article that made them look as if they were suspected in the Boston Marathon bombings inflicted emotional distress.

headline.seo: New York Post Sued Over Boston Bombing Article
headline.main: New York Post Faces Suit Over Boston Bomb Article
headline.print_headline: New York Post Faces Suit Over Boston Bomb Article
